heading: Ko hono fakamatalaʻi ʻo e founga ʻo e tāpuakiʻi ʻa e uaine ʻo e sākalamēnití. Taʻu T.S. 401–421 nai.

verses.txt: Ko e founga ʻo hono tāpuakiʻi ʻo e uainé—Vakai, naʻa nau toʻo ʻa e ipú, ʻo pehē:

ʻE ʻOtua, ko e Tamai Taʻengatá, ʻoku mau kole ki hoʻo ʻafió, ʻi he huafa ʻo ho ʻAlo ko Sīsū Kalaisí, ke tāpuakiʻi mo fakatapui ʻa e uainé ni ki he ngaahi laumālie ʻo kinautolu kotoa pē ʻe inu aí, ke nau fai ia ʻi he fakamanatu ki he taʻataʻa ʻo ho ʻAló, ʻa ia naʻe lilingi koeʻuhi ko kinautolu; ke nau fakamoʻoniʻi ai ki hoʻo ʻafió, ʻe ʻOtua, ko e Tamai Taʻengatá, ʻoku nau manatu maʻu ai pē kiate ia, koeʻuhi ke ʻiate kinautolu ʻa hono Laumālié. ʻĒmeni.
